org.unbunt.ella.compiler
Class TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor

java.lang.Object
  org.unbunt.ella.compiler.TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor
Enclosing class:
TailCallOptimizer
protected static class TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor
extends java.lang.Object

Takes a function definition expression, detects tail calls in it and marks them as such. The interpreter then uses this information to decide whether to perform tail call optimization on a function call or not.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor.LastVisitor
          Detects calls and return statements which are the last statements in a function.
protected static class TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor.ReturnArgVisitor
          Traverses arguments to return expressions and marks appropriate function calls as tail-calls.
protected static class TailCallOptimizer.OptimizingVisitor.ReturnVisitor
          Detects function calls in return statements appearing in the middle of some block and marks them as tail calls.
